snippet: The tourism agency for the Orlando, Fla., region says its area drew more visitors than New York City, though New York responds that the claim unfairly includes territory far from Orlando.
abstract: The tourism agency for the Orlando, Fla., region says its area drew more visitors than New York City, though New York responds that the claim unfairly includes territory far from Orlando.

headline.main: Orlando's One-Upmanship Continues in Tourism Claims
